ai-mil7.2.10:1.1_0: “Venerable sir, what are the two goats to the charnel ground? What one must be taken by one.”
ai-mil7.2.10:1.2_0: “Great king, if a monkeys the mark, or a cart, or a large tree in such a room, or a place where there is a large tree trunk;
ai-mil7.2.10:1.3_0: In the same way, great king, one who lives in balance with good friends, companions, and associates can live in the discourses.
ai-mil7.2.10:1.4_0: This is the first monkey, we should get up.
ai-mil7.2.10:2.1_0: Furthermore, a monkey stands still, if he stands.
ai-mil7.2.10:2.2_0: In the same way, a meditator should entertain the connection with care of his rod and seated in front of them.
ai-mil7.2.10:2.3_0: this is the second monkey, great king.
ai-mil7.2.10:2.4_0: The senior monk who has heard the statement of the Teacher:
ai-mil7.2.10:5.1_0: The first kind of existence is the first absorption.
ai-mil7.2.10:7.2_0: Taking the lamp as an island,
